definition: the position on a baseball team of the player who is stationed behind home plate and who catches the balls that the pitcher throws
details:
noun
- the position on a baseball team of the player who is stationed behind home plate and who catches the balls that the pitcher throws
= example: the position on a baseball team of the player who is stationed behind home plate and who catches the balls that the pitcher throws
- (baseball) the person who plays the position of catcher
= synonyms: backstop
